::Squizzy::

Squizzy stops at a table, much like one you would fine at a dentist's 
office in the future. She turns to Vamprah. "Now sit down here and we 
can begin." She said cheerfully.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> She sighed and followed Squizzy
